title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Seven stories from April 2008 'Train the trainer' workshop at ACMI.
description: These seven stories are a culmination of a Digital Storytelling 'Train the trainer' workshop, held at ACMI in April 2008. The stories are of a personal nature and are centred around an important part of the participant's lives.
